lgp.core.environment.config

Class Configuration

  • lgp.core.environment.config.Configuration

  • public class Configuration

    Represents the parameters that can be set for the an LGP environment.

    An implementation of interface ConfigurationLoader can load class Configurations from a specified source.

    See Also:
    interface ConfigurationLoader, class Configuration

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Configuration()
      Represents the parameters that can be set for the an LGP environment.

      • getOperations

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getOperations()

        A collection of fully-qualified class names specifying the classes of class Operations to be loaded into an class Environment.

        NOTE: Custom loaders can be provided that can provided a collection of class Operations in some custom way, by implementing the interface OperationLoader interface.

        See Also:
        class Operation, class Environment, class Operation, interface OperationLoader

      • setOperations

        NOTE: Custom loaders can be provided that can provided a collection of class Operations in some custom way, by implementing the interface OperationLoader interface.

        See Also:

      • getConstantsRate

        public double getConstantsRate()

        The probability with which instructions in an LGP program will contain a constant value.

      • setConstantsRate

        public void setConstantsRate(double p)

        The probability with which instructions in an LGP program will contain a constant value.

      • getConstants

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getConstants()

        Any values to be used as constants in an LGP program.

        NOTE: Constants are specified as string values to permit the use of custom register types. This means that a custom interface ConstantLoader will need to be implemented to load the list of strings into an appropriate type suitable to be loaded into a register set.

        See Also:
        interface ConstantLoader

      • setConstants

        public void setConstants(java.util.List<java.lang.String> p)

        Any values to be used as constants in an LGP program.

        NOTE: Constants are specified as string values to permit the use of custom register types. This means that a custom interface ConstantLoader will need to be implemented to load the list of strings into an appropriate type suitable to be loaded into a register set.

        See Also:
        interface ConstantLoader

      • getStoppingCriterion

        public double getStoppingCriterion()

        Determines the threshold for stopping the evolutionary process.

        When a solution with a fitness of Configuration.getStoppingCriterion is found, the search will stop. By default, we don't stop until the fitness is minimised perfectly.

        See Also:
        Configuration.getStoppingCriterion

      • setStoppingCriterion

        public void setStoppingCriterion(double p)

        Determines the threshold for stopping the evolutionary process.

        When a solution with a fitness of Configuration.getStoppingCriterion is found, the search will stop. By default, we don't stop until the fitness is minimised perfectly.

        See Also:
        Configuration.getStoppingCriterion
